metadata.title: CVE-2017-12927 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Cacti 1.1.17 in the methodparameter in spikekill.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12927` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
